PARAMETER.name: PARAM_ID_ENDPOINT_DETECT_THRESHOLD
PARAMETER.description: parameter used to set the beginning-of-speech and#[ #] end-of-speech thresholds

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: epd_begin_threshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold for the beginning of speech

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: epd_end_threshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold for the end of speech

PARAMETER.name: PARAM_ID_GAIN
PARAMETER.description: parameter used to set the gain that is applied to the audio incoming data

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Gain applied to the#[ #] data

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: This field must be set to zero

PARAMETER.name: PARAM_ID_SWMAD_ENABLE
PARAMETER.description: parameter used to enable Software Mic Activity Detection (SWMAD)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tracks the current version of this parameter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies#[ #] whether the module is enabled

PARAMETER.name: PARAM_ID_SWMAD_CFG
PARAMETER.description: Parameter used to configure Software Mic Activity Detection (SWMAD)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tracks the current version of this parameter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sw_mad_thresh_Q23
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Score threshold for the binary classifier

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sw_mad_gain_Q8
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Gain value#[ #] to multiply to input samples

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: This field must be#[ #] set to 0

PARAMETER.name: PARAM_ID_SWMAD_MODEL
PARAMETER.description: parameter used to register the SWMAD model. The SWMAD model contains the#[ #] unique sound characteristics or signatures used by the algorithm hosted in the module.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: bolb
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Payload is Blob which represents the sound model and it's size is mentioned in param_size

PARAMETER.name: PARAM_ID_BUFFERING_MODULE_INFO

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: module_id
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Buffering module id

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: instance_id
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Buffering module instance id

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Reserved space for alignment

PARAMETER.name: PARAM_ID_DETECTION_ENGINE_CONFIG_VOICE_WAKEUP
PARAMETER.description: PARAM_ID_DETECTION_ENGINE_CONFIG is getting#[ #] redefined here. These details are specific to Voice Wakeup while inheriting the original definition

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: mode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Flags#[ #] that configure the Voice Wakeup module to run in different modes

BITFIELD.description: Detection Events are sent to the HLOS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: custom_payload_size
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Size of addition custom configuration sent to detection engine module. If custom_payload_size isnâ€™t 4byte aligned size, then caller#[ #] needs to fill padding bytes to ensure that entire calibration is 4byte aligned. Immediately following this variable is the custom configuration#[ #] Payload of size custom_payload_size.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tracks the current version of this parameter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: num_active_models
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Sum of all keyword models plus the active user models

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: list
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: This list contains two arrays (Confidence levels and Keyword/User Enables). Confidence Levels: This is an array of size#[ #] num_active_models and each element is 1 byte long. This field enumerates the confidence level for each keywords and active user pair. Assuming#[ #] there are N keywords and M active user models included in the model, then the first N elements of this parameter corresponds to N keywords#[ #] confidence. The N+1 to N+M elements controls M active user model's confidence level. Each element maps confidence values for entries (keyword#[ #] and/or user specific keyword) whose order is specified in sound model. Keyword/User enable: Immediately following this structure is an array of#[ #] size num_active_models and each element is 1 byte long. This field enumerates the enabling(1)/disabling(0) status for each keywords and active#[ #] user pair. Assuming there are N keywords and M active user models included in the model, then the first N elements of this parameter corresponds#[ #] to N keywords enabling/disabling. The N+1 to N+M elements controls M active user model's enabling/disabling. Each element maps#[ #] enable(1)/disable(0) values for entries (keyword and/or user specific keyword) whose order is specified in sound model.

PARAMETER.name: PARAM_ID_DETECTION_ENGINE_EVENT_VOICE_WAKEUP
PARAMETER.description: PARAM_ID_DETECTION_ENGINE_EVENT is getting#[ #] redefined here. These details are specific to Voice Wakeup while inheriting the original definition

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: status
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Status returned by algorithm

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: custom_payload_size
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Size of addition custom configuration sent to detection engine module. If custom_payload_size isnâ€™t 4byte aligned size, then caller#[ #] needs to fill padding bytes to ensure that entire calibration is 4byte aligned. Immediately following this variable is the custom configuration#[ #] Payload of size custom_payload_size.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tracks the current version of this parameter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: num_active_models
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Sum of all keyword models plus the active user models

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: list
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: This list is an array of size num_active_models and each element is 1 byte long. This field enumerates the detection confidence level#[ #] for each keywords and active user pair. Assuming there are N keywords and M active user models included in the model, then the first N elements of#[ #] this parameter corresponds to N keywords detection confidence level. The N+1 to N+M elements highlights the M active user model's detection#[ #] confidence level. Each element maps it's confidence level values for entries (keyword and/or user specific keyword) whose order is specified in#[ #] sound model.
